thread.title: 24 of the Best Parodies of that 'Roll Safe' Meme
thread.title_full: 24 of the Best Parodies of that 'Roll Safe' Meme

author: Anonymous
title: 24 of the Best Parodies of that 'Roll Safe' Meme
text:
24 of the Best Parodies of that 'Roll Safe' Meme Tweet Posted: Sun, 2/12/2017 - 8:58pm by Desi Jedeikin 
The Roll Safe meme, featuring 22-year-old actor Kayode Ewumi, gave us all the best life hacks and advice . The meme took off fast, so fast in fact, that almost immediately there parodies of the meme, featuring some of our favorite pop culture characters doling out their own amazing advice. Soon even brands and police departments were making their own. Here's a look at some of the best twists on what is already a classic meme! 1. 
— Nintendo NY (@NintendoNYC) February 10, 2017 2. 
— Link 勇 (@HyruIeSavior) February 10, 2017 7. No need to worry about this planet if you use half A presses to travel to parallel universes pic.twitter.com/gL5siARSCi Feb 8, 2017 at 3:03pm PST 9. 
— DC Police Department (@DCPoliceDept) February 9, 2017 10. 
— Khairy the Comedian (@OMG_ItsKhairy) February 4, 2017 11. Feb 2, 2017 at 8:44am PST 14. Feb 11, 2017 at 7:25am PST 15. 
— David Will (@TheTrashbang) February 12, 2017 21. Can't blow a 25 point lead in the Super Bowl if you never make it to the Super Bowl pic.twitter.com/8scQuScZg4
